subject: Steroids
Baseball
Perjury
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The government insisted it has overwhelming proof that the former pitcher lied when he said he never used performance-enhancing drugs, but the defense said the main witness is a fraud.
snippet: The government insisted it has overwhelming proof that the former pitcher lied when he said he never used performance-enhancing drugs, but the defense said the main witness is a fraud.
